thread.title: Mary Ann Corum
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by Mary Ann Corum

author: Mary Ann Corum
title: Mary Ann Corum
text: My sister and I had a 3-way call set up by Jason which worked wonderfully. We told him what we were looking for and what we wanted to spend and he found it! Last year he sent us to Mexico and we had a wonderful time. This year we are going to a new country for us and we are very excited. All arrangements last year were perfect and we know they will be this year-especially the ride to and from hotel. We recommend Jason to everyone. Our only regret is that he can't come with us! He even made the planning fun. He went beyond when I called back to include flyer no. best older sisters Mary Ann Corum and Kathleen Raupp
